name: Mozelle Denae
text:
I will change this review to 5 stars when you guys get it together.

Last time I ordered from you, I ordered 18 wings.  You have me 12 wings.  You ‚Ä¶More

name: Nyra Rayn
text: I ordered a cheese crust and they delivered plain then wouldn't take ownership of their screw up. DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS LOCATION! They will not own up to their mistakes.

name: Mateo DeLaCruz
text: One of the best commercial pizza joints. There's not much in the menu that isn't good to eat. They have beer, on delivery if needed which is rare and a great convenience in the later parts of the night. The on line deals...there's always one that catches the eye. I've never regreted eating here.

name: Kristina Carden
text: Who ever made my pizza on Friday night you did an amazing job it's nice and cheesy and yummy üòÅ

name: Janelle Hernandez
text: I unfortunately have to give this location a bad review due to the fact that every time I order from here my pizza is under cooked and soggy and cold.

name: Cyn You
text: I drive 12 miles out of my way for this pizza hut!  Shayna is amazing. Makes the best food.

name: Kristen Sunderland
text: Every single time I order there's an issue!!! Everything from completely wrong order, smashed pizza, to having it delivered 30+ min after their ETA cold... I gave them yet another chance tonight and was disappointed again!  DONE!

name: Daniel Fieldstone
text: Why do I love this Pizza Hut so much?  Well the same reason why you and anyone should love it so much.  This place has a very small triangular lobby.  It really is a lobby that is so small you will think you are at a hole in the wall place in New York!!!

name: Paola Palomino
text: Terrible customer service. The manager Kim could not help me apply a promo code to my order but she said full price should be fine or I can try another Pizza Hut 3 miles from here...

name: Emmanuel Reyes
text: Order a pizza at 6:30 at 7:15 I get a call from a complete different dealership that my food was delivered down the road and that I have to drive or walk over to pick it up. Driver didn't even bother bringing it to the actual address on the ‚Ä¶More

name: Tyler McGhee
text: The dude with the beanie gave exceptional service. I‚Äôll be back again because of him. Wish I got his name.

name: Ale&Tone S
text: Good pizza... I get the thin crust with extra sauce very good. My only problem is little ceasars thin crust is better for way cheaper üôÑ

name: ingrid ramos
text: my kids and I love pizza Hut

name: Albert Chavez
text:
Pizza obviously is great but the service is Awesome!
Great people!

name: marieleelee
text: For some reason this location keeps canceling my orders or part of my orders without notification. All they do is send an automated email saying the order was not processed.

name: Fortitude Mind
text: Ordered 2 large 3 item pizzas...‚Ä¶.1 had only 2 toppings and the other had 1 topping that was not correct. They said it would be ready in 20 minutes for pickup, when I picked them up 20 minutes later and got home  ( I live 1 mile away ) it was only room temperature and tasted like cardboard. I will never order from them again.

name: Natalie Blair
text: Ordered a pizza and it got to me on time, but when I opened the box it was all smashed to the side. The slices were cut up like a jigsaw, and when I took a bite the dough was raw. I had to bake it in my oven to make it taste reasonable. I won't be ordering here again.

name: Yvette E
text: Good workers. Thanks

name: Ebony Renee
text: Will never get wings again from here smh!

name: Mo Tafolla
text: Great customer service .  Pizza was hot and delicious.

name: John Preston
text: It was a quick in & out to order while my son finished up his time at Flip Dunk Sports, the trampoline park in the same center. It was then quick in& out to pick up the 2 personal pan pizzas that were done in less than the 10 minutes allotted by the counter guy.

name: Tom Koetz
text: I order for the first time via the web site.when the pizza arrived it had a topping that we didnt order. More than likely i made a mistake when ordering. The manager corrected the problem. ‚Ä¶More

name: Deedra Rehm
text: Love working here my coworkers are awesome fun to work with and kind people

name: Keila Watley
text: GOOD JOB PIZZA HUT

name: IndicaOfficial
text: I had the WORST experience with Pizza Hut. Your location in Phoenix AZ  16th street & Bethany home rd needs to be retrained on customer service. Not only did my whole house get poisoned the guy asked me to not returned to the store when I ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Nunez
text: Manager Jay was rude and was mocking my Autistic Nephew on the phone while we were attempting to put in a big family order. I am embarrassed for their business for this mistreatment. We will never consider ordering from this location again.

name: Zee S A
text: Thanks guys for resending our pizzas out at no additonal charge truly appreciate that!!

name: Dudes With A Camera
text: Great staff and great service

name: Rick B
text: Good online deals and decent pizza for the price.

name: Stephen Brown
text: They took my order wrong and made me wait another 15 minutes after waiting 20 minutes for a carry out. On top of that the price was not worth what I got. No good deals and pizza was still not cooked all the way in the middle

name: michael langellier
text: Asked for them to make my pizzas awesome, went to pick them up, they showed me awesome pizzas and told me they made them awesome, got home and ate awesome pizza. Awesome.

name: Daniel Botello
text:
One of the best places to eat a great pizza.
Great customer service, great it once I get to the door. That's one of the reasons I loved buying my pizza at this location. These guys really go the extra mile.

name: Ruben Martinez
text: The customer service at this location was very professional friendly and knowledgeable. The pizza was DELICIOUS! I know there are many fancy options in the valley but I was impressed with this location and you can't beat the price.

name: Rachel Burger
text: The pizza arrived in 30 minutes, which is faster then they told us it would be, however, the food was SO SALTY! I ordered a large thin crust pepperoni pizza, and only could have 1.5 slices since the salty taste was so strong, and after my tongue hurt from the salt. Yuck.

name: Steve a
text: Pizza supposed to be ready by 6:48...still waiting at 7:05. 2 people on staff in the whole place and the phone has been ringing for 15 minutes straight unanswered. ‚Ä¶More

name: David Ramirez
text: Long wait where I had to ask every 5 minutes to see when my pizza was done after 20 minutes. I have came here before but never received this type of customer service. I was hungry and upset, even more when they didn‚Äôt fully cook one of my ‚Ä¶More

name: Wow Amazing
text: I've ordered pizza here two times since I moved to the area and they might as well stamp "Made in China" on the box because the quality sucks. The first time the spinach was just thrown dry on the pizza, not heated at all. The girl said it ‚Ä¶More

name: Darren Mauger
text: I just ordered over $200  and a good tip for the  delivery boy.  pizza, wings, and posta for 18 people after we received the order we tried to dish out the pizza and we realized that there was no plates peppers or parmesan cheese I called ‚Ä¶More

name: Kim Johnson
text: Not only did they deliver an incomplete order, but when I called to have them correct it, wanted me to pay anotber delivery fee, which I thought was unfair being that I already paid one. I was hung up on several times by the "manager" James ‚Ä¶More

text: Have never had a complaint. Pizza has always been hot and tasty and on time.

text: Great food, great service!

name: Christopher Gorbett
text: Good place to eat and good deals

name: Rebekah Ramos
text: Foods good, but half the time a delivery will take 2 hours and the pizza is cold. If its around 30 min go for it. Any longer and your basically waiting for an expensive disappointment.

name: M O
text: Worst pizza hut location. The girl spent 5 min counting coins when I was the only customer and was just there for a pickup. My pizza also had very little cheese compared to what I'm used to at pizza hut.

name: Jorge Galaz
text: Lol. The decor isn't even worth mentioning. But the service and food have been excellent so far. 2 years and counting.

name: Wendy Rivera
text: Ordered a pizza 3 or 4 weeks ago, and it took a little over 2 hours to get to me...I live 4 blocks away mind you. The pizza was cold and the soda warm. The delivery guy didn't even apologize.

name: Tayonna Wright
text: Everything was going great until I found a hair in my pizza. I suggest, if there are men making the pizzas, SHAVE REGULARLY because it was at least an inch long.

name: Sean Oleary
text: I ordered here more then once every time there a problem this time I ordered frys with my food  literally only got six pices And you call and they give me nothing but an attitude

text: Love the food great service

name: Doolin Onion
text: This pizza hut has forgotten to put the sauce on my pizza TWICE, once coulda been a fluke but twice this location has made me a pizza and delivered it without any sauce on it. Dough, cheese, toppings.

name: Taurus McMillan
text: Definetly a great location , had an issue with my order and the friendly staff handled it professionally and with out wait. They are always nice and never have cold deliveries .
